2016.donphan.bundle.2: Roll Out with the Donphan Bundle!
2016.donphan.bundle.3: Spin and stomp your opponent flat with Donphan’s Wreck attack! It does a massive 140 damage if there’s a Stadium card in play. You also get two 10-card booster packs from Black & White—Legendary Treasures, plus the complete Donphan avatar outfit!
2016.donphan.bundle.4: This bundle contains: 2 Pokémon TCG: Black and White—Legendary Treasures booster packs (10-card) 1 foil Donphan Pokémon card (Black & White—Plasma Storm, 72/135) 1 foil Phanpy Pokémon card (Black & White—Plasma Storm, 71/135) 1 Fighting Stadium card (XY—Furious Fists, 90/111) 1 Donphan Avatar Set including: • Donphan Avatar Hat • Donphan Avatar Glasses • Donphan Avatar Jacket • Donphan Avatar Shirt • Donphan Avatar Shoes • Donphan Avatar Trousers These cards are legal for Expanded format tournaments and competition. This offer runs through April 18, 2017. This bundle is only available in the Pokémon TCG Online and is not sold in retail stores as a physical product.
2017.tpci.product.easter.treasure-tin.de:
A Pokémon Treasure Chest!

A trove of Pokémon treasures! This sturdy metal case contains more than a dozen special Pokémon goodies, including many not found anywhere else.

The Pokémon Trading Card Game: Collector Chest includes:

5 Pokémon TCG booster packs
3 foil promo cards featuring Rowlet, Litten, and Popplio!
A cool Pokémon coin
2 colorful sticker sheets
A mini album to store your favorite cards
A Pokémon notepad and 4 pencils
com.direwolfdigital.cake.data.archetypes: Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Camerupt-EX.
Your turn does not end if the Pokémon this card is attached to becomes M Sharpedo-EX.
com.direwolfdigital.cake.rules.abilities: You may discard the top 3 cards of each player’s deck. If you do, this attack does 40 more damage for each Energy card you discarded in this way.
This attack does 10 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokémon for each {C} in that Pokémon's Retreat Cost. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
customchoice.xypromo_198.magmaeruption: Would you like to discard the top 3 cards of each player's deck? This attack will do 40 more damage for each Energy card discarded in this way.
specialvisualizations.additionaltype: This Pokémon is more than one type.
specialvisualizations.player.bw10_23.cur: This player can't attach any Special Energy cards from their hand to their Pokémon.
tpci.2017.pokemon.league.q1.s3.name: Sun & Moon Season 3
tpci.2017.pokemon.league.q1.season3.desc: Thank you for attending your local Pokémon League! This code will unlock 4 foil Primarina promo cards and a set of Sun & Moon themed card sleeves for you to enjoy or trade!
tpci.2017.pokemon.league.q1.sleeve.name: Sun & Moon Card Sleeves
